thread.title: Janet
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Janet

author: Janet
title: Janet
text:
I have an old 'New Team' shower pump and the inlet washer had perished, causing a leak. New Team themselves didn't stock this part and advised me to contact The Shower Doctor.
Since the installation of my pump, the part number no longer existed but Shower Doctor had a similar part which was sent instantly and the washer fitted perfectly. Thank you Shower Doctor, I will certainly use you again and recommend you to family and friends.
